statements: SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, class_date FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC, class_date ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, class_date FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 101 ORDER BY class_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' AND start_time > '09:00:00' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_name LIKE 'M%' AND end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_id, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_name = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY class_id;
SELECT MAX(class_date), MIN(start_time), AVG(instructor_id) FROM class_schedule;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE class_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_date FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, available_date, start_time, end_time FROM instructor_availability WHERE instructor_id = '987e6543-f321-98a7-6543-214365981000';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01' AND class_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT instructor_name, available_date FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT class_name, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01' AND class_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE class_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT instructor_name, available_date, start_time, end_time FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT instructor_name, available_date, start_time, end_time FROM instructor_availability ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_day='Monday';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructor WHERE instructor_phone='123-456-7890';
SELECT class_id, class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_day='Wednesday' AND start_time <= '09:00:00';
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM class_schedule WHERE class_day = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM instructor WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructor WHERE instructor_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_day = 'Wednesday' AND (start_time >= '09:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00');
SELECT class_name, class_day, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_day IN ('Monday', 'Thursday') ORDER BY class_name ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE schedule_day = 'Monday';
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(instructor_id) AS instructor_count FROM instructor_availability GROUP BY instructor_name;
SELECT class_id, instructor_id FROM class_instructor WHERE instructor_id = 123;
SELECT instructor_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM instructor_rating GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, schedule_day, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3 ORDER BY schedule_day DESC;

SELECT class_name, instructor_name, schedule_day, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule s JOIN class_instructor ci ON s.class_id = ci.class_id JOIN instructor_availability ia ON ci.instructor_id = ia.instructor_id WHERE ia.availability_day = 'Monday' AND s.schedule_day = 'Monday';
SELECT instructor_name, rating, total_ratings FROM instructor_availability ia JOIN instructor_rating ir ON ia.instructor_id = ir.instructor_id WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;

SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule s JOIN class_instructor ci ON s.class_id = ci.class_id JOIN instructor_availability ia ON ci.instructor_id = ia.instructor_id WHERE start_time < '10:00:00' AND end_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, day_of_week, time_start, time_end FROM class_schedule ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, email FROM instructor WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT location_name, address, capacity FROM class_location WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM class_enrollment JOIN instructor_availability ON class_enrollment.schedule_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, day_of_week FROM class_schedule WHERE time_start BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT class_location.location_name, class_enrollment.student_id FROM class_location JOIN class_enrollment ON class_location.location_id = class_enrollment.schedule_id;
SELECT instructor_name, email, phone_number FROM instructor WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT class_name, day_of_week, time_start, time_end FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3 AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
